about_the_game:
Spy Guy Hidden Objects Deluxe Game

Welcome to the charming Treflik City– a picturesque town inhabited by Treflix. Although it's a small and friendly place, even here, residents sometimes need the support of a detective. That's when Spy Guy comes to the rescue – a super detective capable of solving any mystery and catching every criminal in the city. However, he can't do it without your help! In addition to the exciting spy missions we want to present in the game, our creation offers a unique visual setting crafted by a talented team of artists. The entire game is precisely designed with hand-drawn details, where the player's task is to find hidden objects in the game's scenery.

How to Play?

Various items have been scattered across different cities – try to find them all! Immerse yourself in the detective adventure of Spy Guy Hidden Objects Deluxe and conquer up to 120 animated, secret-filled levels. Follow the clues, uncovering the city's secrets. Test your observation and detective skills, train your focus and concentration.

Maps – Discover Them All!

In addition to the basic Spy Guy Hidden Objects Deluxe map, detective challenges await you on the maps of Sopot, Germany, and the christmas-themed board. You'll find hidden objects related to each location, fascinating historical facts, and plenty of puzzles and challenges!

Game Modes

A completely new gameplay experience in game modes tailored to how you like to play – basic mode, speedrun mode, and challenge mode.

Unique Puzzles

For the first time in the virtual version, Spy Guy puzzles are available at three difficulty levels. Thanks to them, you'll embark on a fascinating journey full of unique details. Immerse yourself in a two-dimensional world where each board is unique. Solve puzzles to reveal beautiful images featuring well-known places, characters, and objects.

Will you manage to find them all? Explore the detective world of the bravest Treflik the detective and help him save Treflik City.
